issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Is not a bug in our product
resolution.name: Not Our Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Appcelerator CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Tooling and the CLI here

fields.description:
I can no longer log into the AMPLIFY Appcelerator Services. Any login fails with the error message listed below.

appc login --log-level trace
Appcelerator Command-Line Interface, version 6.2.0
Copyright (c) 2014-2018, Appcelerator, Inc.  All Rights Reserved.

2018-08-29T17:35:00.565Z | TRACE  | set environment to {"registry":"https://software.appcelerator.com","baseurl":"https://platform.appcelerator.com"}
2018-08-29T17:35:00.576Z | TRACE  | executing command "login" with no plugins
2018-08-29T17:35:00.656Z | DEBUG  | Get username and password...
2018-08-29T17:35:00.657Z | INFO   | Appcelerator Login required to continue ...

? Appcelerator ID: <Appcelerator ID>
? Password: ****************
2018-08-29T17:35:22.405Z | DEBUG  | Get the registry...
2018-08-29T17:35:22.405Z | DEBUG  | Do login...
2018-08-29T17:35:23.076Z | TRACE  | request result undefined undefined false undefined true 1
2018-08-29T17:35:23.077Z | TRACE  | login returned { Error: self signed certificate in certificate chain
    at TLSSocket.<anonymous> (_tls_wrap.js:1103:38)
    at emitNone (events.js:106:13)
    at TLSSocket.emit (events.js:208:7)
    at TLSSocket._finishInit (_tls_wrap.js:637:8)
    at TLSWrap.ssl.onhandshakedone (_tls_wrap.js:467:38)
  code: 'SELF_SIGNED_CERT_IN_CHAIN',
  error: 'com.appcelerator.auth.connection.server.error' } undefined
2018-08-29T17:35:23.077Z | DEBUG  | body undefined
2018-08-29T17:35:23.077Z | DEBUG  | err { Error: self signed certificate in certificate chain
    at TLSSocket.<anonymous> (_tls_wrap.js:1103:38)
    at emitNone (events.js:106:13)
    at TLSSocket.emit (events.js:208:7)
    at TLSSocket._finishInit (_tls_wrap.js:637:8)
    at TLSWrap.ssl.onhandshakedone (_tls_wrap.js:467:38)
  code: 'SELF_SIGNED_CERT_IN_CHAIN',
  error: 'com.appcelerator.auth.connection.server.error' }
2018-08-29T17:35:23.078Z | ERROR  | login failed, please try again
fields.summary: Cannot log into the AMPLIFY Appcelerator Services

comments.body: Resolving since this was resolved by disabling the anti-virus app.
